name: Navi's Journey
description:
What can you do when you have one hungry gator, worldwide companions, and chicken drumsticks? Why, find food of course! Help a hungry gator get food by traveling around the world to her companions. After all, "you're not you when you're hungry!" :)

Thanks to the Gator Fried Chicken group with SomeRandomStrats, Steve, Firefox-Chan, and PenguinsAnonymous.
